Built on Backbone means that its a cinch to integrate or extend plus all the benefits of simple event binding, and object inheritance

Designed to connect to backends as well as hold data in memory - this means you can write the same code whether you have a few hundred records in memory or millions of records in a backend database

Out of the box support for 

Rich set of views shipped with the library incorporating best-of-breed third-party components including SlickGrid

Only take what you need - it's easy to only take the components that you need. Backends have no dependencies other than underscore and JQuery. Models have no dependencies on other components etc.

Easy to customize and extend.
